beginner.question: What is the supreme law of the land?
Who was the first president of the United States?

intermediate.question: What year was the U.S. Constitution ratified?
How many amendments does the U.S. Constitution have?

advanced.question: What is the main purpose of the preamble of the U.S. Constitution?
choices: To explain the goals of the government
To outline the rights of citizens
To set the terms of the presidency
advanced.answer: To explain the goals of the government

advanced.question: Which amendment gave women the right to vote?
